articles.description: Dr. Joseph Varon has gone viral for hugging a COVID-19 patient over the Thanksgiving weekend.
articles.content: Dr. Joseph Varon, who takes care of COVID-19 patients at United Memorial Medical Center in Texas, recently went viral after hugging a distraught coronavirus patient in the hospital over the holiday w… [+2149 chars]

articles.author: Dan Gunderson
articles.title: 'Everyone's overwhelmed at this point': Caregivers challenged by latest pandemic surge - Minnesota Public Radio News
articles.description: State officials say this is a critical time in the coronavirus outbreak. This week, four Mayo Clinic staff members who have been working with COVID-19 patients since the beginning of the pandemic talked about their experiences on a call with reporters.
articles.content:
State officials say this is a critical time in the coronavirus outbreak, with hospitals across the region at or near capacity with the influx of COVID-19 patients.

articles.title: Even teachers shunned kids of woman with HIV - Tales of torment and discrimination - Jamaica Gleaner
articles.description: Althea was 27 years old and pregnant when she found out that she was HIV-positive. “It was already rumoured in my community before I did my test due to a prior relationship my partner had. So I was already expecting the positive result. I was just...
